display_html:
data Occurence a
  • = Hint {
    • unOcc :: a
    }
  • | Evidence {
    • unOcc :: a
    }
  • | MissingInformation {
    • unOcc :: a
    }
name: Occurence Hint Evidence MissingInformation unOcc

display_html:
data Formula v
  • = Var v
  • | Yes
  • | No
  • | Not (Formula v)
  • | (Formula v) :&&: (Formula v)
  • | (Formula v) :||: (Formula v)
  • | (Formula v) :++: (Formula v)
  • | (Formula v) :->: (Formula v)
  • | (Formula v) :<->: (Formula v)
  • | All [Formula v]
  • | Some [Formula v]
  • | None [Formula v]
  • | ExactlyOne [Formula v]
  • | AtMostOne [Formula v]
  • | Let (Formula v) (Formula v -> Formula v)
  • | Bound Integer
name: Formula Var All Bound None Not Let :++: Some :||: :&&: :->: :<->: ExactlyOne AtMostOne Yes No
